resources.string: Only those who care about you can hear you when you’re quiet.
True friendship isn’t about being inseparable. It’s being separated and nothing changes.
Good friends are like stars. You don’t always see them but you know they are there.
True friends aren’t the ones who make your problems disappear. They are the ones who won’t disappear when you are facing problems.
Friends are the people who make you smile brighter, laugh louder and live better.
A friend is someone who understands your past, believes in your future, and accepts you just the way you are.
True friends are never apart, maybe in distance, but never in heart.
Remember, the greatest gift is not found in the store but in the hearts of true friends.
Best friends make the good times better and hard times easier.
